radiographic_examinations.findings: There is a 1-2 mm subpleural pulmonary nodule in the right middle lobe, which has been stable since ___. The appendix is dilated to 10 mm and demonstrates a thickened, hyperenhancing wall with adjacent fat stranding, consistent with acute appendicitis. There is no free air or drainable collection.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The pulmonary nodule has been stable since ___.
